markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Deny the Songs of War](/Feats.aspx?ID=3041) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Nantambu Chime-Ringer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=106)

**Prerequisites**
[Nantambu Chime-Ringer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3039)

</column>

---

To keep the peace, you disrupt those who seek to break it. You can cast [_deafness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=62) and 4th-level [_silence_](/Spells.aspx?ID=287) once per day each as innate spells. The tradition of these spells is the one you chose for the Nantambu Chime-Ringer Dedication feat.
name: Deny the Songs of War
